[[tab Additional Info]]

++ About the Artist

[[include component:image-block
name=headerNEW.png|
caption=Pictured: me|
align=center|
width=600px|
]]

Hey all, I'm [[*user barredowl]], a somewhat ambitious artist and turtleneck sweater enthusiast. As of now, I mostly draw via a little program by the name of Photopea. It's trash, sure, but it's //my// trash, you know?

++ The Process

++++ Pixel Art

So usually, when I'm thinking of drawing an SCP, I usually tend towards a situation which I can easily display. For example, maybe the interview log in [[[SCP-3980]]], or the gramophone from [[[SCP-3939]]]. If it's just a simple humanoid, I usually just draw their face. I occasionally just draw a character from the SCP, such as the Masquerade figure from [[[SCP-4430]]].

After I've fully convinced myself that drawing that part of the SCP is going to be fun, I head over to a [https://lospec.com/palette-list palette list] and select something that catches my eye (usually a four-color palette, since that's the easiest to handle in Paint 3D). I download it via a .txt file and head over to Paint 3D to select the individual colors using a hex code.

Then, I shift the canvas to an appropriate size. If it's smaller (i.e, a humanoid picture) I usually choose a 30x30 canvas. If it's larger (i.e a situation I want to illustrate) I shoot for a 60x60. Then, I get to drawing, expand the canvas to 300x300 once it's finished, and publish it here!

++++ Drawings

I usually just draw SCPs that I like, to be honest. Nothing really special. The only real fun tidbit I have to share about the process is that most of my drawings, if colored, are sampled from a [[[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Giorgio_de_Chirico|Giorgio de Chirico]]] painting. You can find the painting sampled from [[[https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/1/1b/De_Chirico%27s_Love_Song.jpg|here]]]!

++ Contact Information

If you want to reach out to me, whether it be commissions, words of praise, or your deepest, darkest confessions, here are some of the sites you can contact me from!

||~ Platform||~ Username||
||Wikidot||[[[http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/barredowl|barredowl]]]||
||IRC||barredowl||
||Instagram||[[[https://www.instagram.com/highwireshrimper/|highwireshrimper]]]||
||SCP Commune||[[[http://scpcommune.wikidot.com/svaria/|barredowl]]]||
||Tumblr||[[[https://highwireshrimper.tumblr.com/|highwireshrimper]]]||

For future reference, I typically don't charge money for commissions, but if you want me to draw something, that article better be damn good or draw-able.

[[module ListUsers users="."]]

Anywho, thank you for your patronage to the kick-ass art page, **##41838e|%%title%%##**, and hope you liked it! :>
